name: The Curious Case of Gotham Jack
name_original: The Curious Case of Gotham Jack
description:
You are Gotham, an ordinary boy who has, to his misfortune, been possessed by infamous ghost Pyro Jackson. You're now suddenly being attacked by Jack's many enemies- but all you want to do is have lunch!

The Curious Case of Gotham Jack is a beat-em-up game in which you must survive until you can eat your food. Can you survive through all 3 meals?
